requirements.summary: Replace Internet Identity admin authentication with username/password login form
acceptanceCriteria: The /admin route shows a login form with email and password fields before authentication
Submitting correct credentials (azadnexus.global@gmail.com / Karusu_7) grants access to the inquiries dashboard
Submitting incorrect credentials shows a visible error message
A logout button is visible on the dashboard and returns the user to the login form
The Internet Identity login flow is removed from the admin page
No 'Access Denied' error appears when using the correct credentials

file_operations.description: Remove Internet Identity authentication logic and replace with a username/password login form. Add state management for login status, error messages, and session management. Call the backend authenticateAdmin function with form credentials. Display InquiriesTable only after successful authentication. Add a logout button that clears the authenticated session and returns to the login form. Remove all references to useInternetIdentity hook and isCallerAdmin query.

Add a new mutation hook useAuthenticateAdmin that calls actor.authenticateAdmin(username, password) and returns the authentication result. This hook should use useMutation from TanStack Query and require the actor from useActor.
